commit.message: style: Add final newline to PatchModuleTest.java

test(crac): add PatchModuleTest for --patch-module compatibility

This test verifies that checkpointing works correctly when using the --patch-module option.

include patch module fds in CRaC check

- Add patch module file descriptor checking to VM_Crac::check_fds
- Implement ClassLoader::get_patch_module_entry_fds
- Update ModulePatcher to use PersistentJarFile for patch modules
